Class MenuMgr

java.lang.Object
Project.MenuMgr
public class MenuMgr extends Object
Class that mainly handles loading and saving the menu
Author:
Abdul Qaiyum Lee

    • addItem

      public void addItem​(MenuItem.ItemType type, String name, String desc, double price)
      Adds a menu item into the menu and sort the menu accordingly
      Parameters:
      type - The type of item to be added
      name - The name of the item to be added
      desc - The description of the item to be added
      price - The price of the item to be added
